1.text: Bring 1 cup (240 mL) of water to a boil and put it into a mug.

3.text: Stir honey and lemon juice into the hot water.

4.text: Add a fresh slice of lemon to the mug for an additional garnish.

5.text: Enjoy your hot honey lemon tea, but be careful to not burn yourself!

6.text: Boil 4 cups (950 mL) of water and pour them into a heatproof pitcher.

7.text: Stir the sugar and baking soda into the hot water until they’ve dissolved.

8.text: Steep 10 black tea bags in the pitcher for 10 minutes.

9.text: Remove the tea bags and squeeze them out over the pitcher.

10.text: Juice 6 lemons into the pitcher and stir the tea.

11.text: Add 4 cups (950 mL) of ice and refrigerate the tea until it gets cool.

12.text: Garnish a glass with 1-2 slices of lemon, pour the tea, and enjoy!

13.text: Grate some fresh ginger into your hot lemon tea for added benefits.

14.text: Enjoy a hot toddy by adding whiskey to your hot lemon tea.

15.text: Take your tea to the next level by adding a sprinkle of dried spice.

16.text: Make a flavored simple syrup to infuse your tea with a new essence.

17.text: Add soda water to make a sparkling iced tea.

18.text: Stir in fresh fruit to add a splash of color and invigorating flavor.
